data.text:
Carillon Historical Park is a 65-acre open-air history museum

that serves as the main campus for Dayton History.

We share the amazing stories of how Dayton changed the world!

Dayton History offers fun-filled historical experiences through the year for the whole family to enjoy. Choose from our annual events & workshops, or create your own personalized historical experience that fits your unique educational needs.
